items.content_html: ngx-heroicons is a lightweight, type-safe Angular library for rendering Heroicons as inline SVGs. It supports all icon styles (outline, solid, mini, micro), works seamlessly with Tailwind CSS, and requires no runtime HTTP requests. Ideal for modern Angular apps.
items.title: atheodosiou/ngx-heroicons: ngx-heroicons is a lightweight, type-safe Angular library for rendering Heroicons as inline SVGs. It supports all icon styles (outline, solid, mini, micro), works seamlessly with Tailwind CSS, and requires no runtime HTTP requests. Ideal for modern Angular apps.

items.content_html: Number System Converter is a lightweight web tool that instantly converts between binary, decimal, hexadecimal, and octal systems while displaying step-by-step calculations. Built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this educational tool visually explains each conversion through digit-by-digit expansions (for decimal conversions).

items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
